00028 #ifndef SIN_H_
00029 #define SIN_H_
00030 
00031 #include "sincos.h"
00032 
00033 namespace vdt {
00034 
00035     // Sin double precision
00036     // --------------------------------------------------------
00037 
00039     inline double fast_sin(double x) {
00040         double s, c;
00041         fast_sincos(x, s, c);
00042         return s;
00043     }
00044 
00045     //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00046 
00047     inline float fast_sinf(float x) {
00048         float s, c;
00049         fast_sincosf(x, s, c);
00050         return s;
00051     }
00052 
00053     //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00054     void sinv(const uint32_t size, double const* __restrict iarray,
00055               double* __restrict oarray);
00056     void fast_sinv(const uint32_t size, double const* __restrict iarray,
00057                    double* __restrict oarray);
00058     void sinfv(const uint32_t size, float const* __restrict iarray,
00059                float* __restrict oarray);
00060     void fast_sinfv(const uint32_t size, float const* __restrict iarray,
00061                     float* __restrict oarray);
00062 
00063 } // vdt namespace
